When we received these, they were not what was listed for the description. The jeans had a patchwork design on them. Luckily enough my daughter did like the pattern on the jeans, so we kept them. We thought maybe it was a one time mistake, so we ordered again only to once again receive the patchwork jeans. Unless this gets corrected, anyone ordering these jeans will most likely get a pair of jeans with a patchwork design on them. We returned the second pair; didn't need two of the same identical pair. Overall, the jeans we did get are not a bad product, just not what we thought we were ordering.

The pants fit my daughter great. However, the pockets are deceptive. The front ones on the hip are NOT as deep as the accent stitching makes it seem (which kinda defeats the purpose of girls cargo pants: to finally get functional pockets you can put things in, like a cell phone in). I marked the bottom of the pocket in yellow in one of the photos. Also the pockets on the side of the legs only have decorative buttons. There's no way to clip or snap the pocket closed.  Bottom line: they're great if you want the look of cargo pants, but be prepared for faux-function. We're returning these.
